turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Jackson, are you out driving right now?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yeah boss, what do you need?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need you to drive to Starbucks to get me a drink. Are you able to do that?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The one on 4th and State in Meadville? What do you want there?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, that one.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Heading there now, what do you want.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I don't usually get coffee so, how about a large one.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Little more complicated then that, boss. I'll walk you through it.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That sounds good, okay, shoot.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I'll get you a large coffee, I suppose you don't care what kind of coffee.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Not at all.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I'll get you whole bean. Do you want milk or sugar. Milk will make it creamier, sugar will make it sweeter.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Definitely two cups of milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it. Do you want it iced?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Iced? You can get coffee iced?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yeah, you can. I don't like it but some people do.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ah, sure. Let's give it a try.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Now they have other things you can put on it if you want.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What do you mean?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Like caramel or whipped cream. Interested in that?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No. Definitely not.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay boss. I have you for one large, iced whole bean coffee with two shots of milk.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Perfect, thanks Jackson. See you soon.
